title: Lauren Goodger 'begs fans to delete pictures taken while watching James Argent sing in Majorca'
text:
Lauren Goodger reportedly begged fans to delete pictures taken of her while she watched James Argent perform in Majorca on Wednesday night.

The reality star, 33, was glued to her phone at Stadium 63 bar in Palma Nova and failed to raise a smile as she waited at the bar for Arg, 31, to take to the stage.

Lauren is said to have demanded the pictures to be deleted- just hours after fans urged her to quit lip fillers after sparking concern with her very plump pout.

Irked: Lauren Goodger reportedly begged fans to delete pictures taken of her while she watched James Argent perform in Majorca on Wednesday night

The fan who took the photo told The Mirror: 'When she noticed me taking a picture she stormed over and demanded that I delete it.'

Lauren slipped into a mustard green dress for the occasion, which showed off her ample cleavage with its plunging neckline, while the thigh-high slit made the most of her tanned pins.

Amping up the glamour with £540 Gucci gold heels, the former TOWIE star appeared in her element as she posed up a storm for her Instagram snaps in the club's toilets - but it seems wasn't happy about fans taking photos of her at the bar.

MailOnline has contacted Lauren's representatives for comment.

Lauren flew out to support Arg, days after paramedics were called to his Essex home after his ex girlfriend Gemma Collins reportedly became concerned for his safety.

In a statement given to The Sun, James insisted he was fine and the reason he did not answer his phone was because he 'wasn't speaking to a certain person'.

True friend: Lauren flew out to support Arg, days after paramedics were called to his Essex home after his ex girlfriend Gemma Collins reportedly became concerned for his safety

He said: 'I wasn’t speaking to a certain person so I didn’t reply. They became concerned and called the police and ambulance.

'They turned up and checked on me. They came up to my room to make sure I was fine.’

Lauren's slew of Mallorcan snaps comes hours after her devoted followers urged her to stay away from lip fillers when she posted a selfie showing off her very plump pout earlier in the day.

Crooner: James regularly flies out to Marbella and Majorca to sing to Brits who have travelled abroad (pictured last month)

While some heaped praise on the star and insisted she was 'stunning girl', others insisted her pout was 'too much'.

One concerned fan wrote: 'For the love of everything holy, stop with the lip fillers... Oh my God Lauren what did you do to your beautiful lips?...'

Another added: 'You were such a beautiful girl, what on earth have you done?!... You look like a completely different person... Stop messing about before you go too far.'

Leaping to her defense however were other followers, who penned: 'You look stunning, it’s really sad and disheartening to see the awful comments you get...

Out and a pout: Lauren's slew of Mallorcan snaps comes hours after her devoted followers urged her to stay away from lip fillers after she posted this snap

Surgery: In 2011, she had a rhinoplasty to fix her broken nose following an accident (pictured left in 2010)

'No ones perfect and the people writing these comments must think they are, how about lead with love?'... I think you look beautiful xx... You actually are a very lovely person so the looks doesnt really matter anyway but the fillers are big girl...'

Since being propelled to the spotlight on the ITVBe show in 2010, Lauren openly admitted to undergoing a nose job, boob job, liposuction to rid her of 'lumps and bumps' and fillers in the past.

In March, Lauren vowed never to get facials fillers again after claiming jaw fillers left her looking like Jim Carrey's 1994 character The Mask, shortly before in June she insisted she was off the fillers having had her face drained.
